title: IGN Tries to Get a Technical in NBA 2K13
description: Supposedly, screaming curse words at Kinect can trigger NBA 2K13 refs to charge your coach with a technical foul. The IGN editors are all too happy to test the theory.

transcript_chunks.text: hey everybody it's Greg Ryan is playing NBA 2K13 apparently if you yell curse words when the ref is over there the Kinect picks it up and we'll give you a technical foul so we're going to do that all together here as soon as he has the intentional foul look he's doing he's making posts happen it's working shot shit it's shot alright here we're going to follow forty dirty how did the Phoenix Suns play so slow **** **** he such a **** did it work I didn't get a technical foul NBA 2K13 better with Kinect
